name: GAZZLERS
abstract: The craziest VR shooter is here!

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Dutch, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
- Added Daily and Weekly Challenges
- Added the Desk Splitter
- Added the Bouncy Hunter
- Added the Timey Wimey
- Added Faulty Mods
- Added a new Danger Indicator for out-of-view attacks
- Added custom music to the ending sequence
- The Post-Game Sequence is skippable
- New players start the game with 5000 Scrap
- Improved reloading consistency
- Slow ‘N’ Steady one-shots enemy rockets
- Radiator does not block shooting when overheated
- Blaze Baller Damage isn’t impacted as much by Damage debuffs
- The visibility on the Volatile Wildlife Mod is improved
- Readability for larger numbers is improved in some panels
- Improved on the Big Wheelus Weak Spots
- Increased the chance of a Turbo Boss wave
- Increased Slow ‘N’ Steady charge rate
- Increased Oozi fire rate
- Increased Volatile Wildlife explosion chance
- Multiple stability improvements
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
